features:
Microlon®: 
Microlon® is a nylon microfiber. It is ultra-soft handling, very comfortable, durable, and easy to care for. Microlon® is not subject to the heat-stress typical of traditional dying techniques and maintains the considerable benefits of microfibers in the finished fabric.

Anatomical design: 
Designed to precisely fit human bone structures.

Elastic arch support: 
Specially designed elastic for better arch support and superior fit.
